title: Transient Bus
content:
Started out as a dot matrix font, sorta wanted to get something new from the style, not sure if i succeded.
bus
tranbus.swf (22 k)
!-/attachment-!\>!-attachment:\>
author: eightone

comments.content:
i like this typeface. my only real suggestion is if you release it, to have a bolder, or thicker version.   
   
over all, nice!   
joshua
